citation: Proclamation under the Roads and Jetties Act 1935 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Roads and Jetties Act 1935

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 7 of the Roads and Jetties Act 1935 â€“

        (a) declare the portions of road specified in Schedule 1 to this proclamation to be a subsidiary road, classified as a developmental road, for the purposes of Part II of that Act; and
        (b) declare that the portion of road specified in Schedule 2 to this proclamation ceases to be a subsidiary road for the purposes of Part II of that Act; and
        (c) amend the proclamation notified in the Gazette as Statutory Rules 1970, No. 67 as follows:
                (i) by omitting from Part I of The Second Schedule to that proclamation the item relating to Lilydale Main Road and substituting the following item:
                                                                                                                                                                                              6.24              
                Lilydale  From the East Tamar Highway at Rocherlea to the northern boundary of its intersection with the Prossers Developmental Road, via George Town Road and Lilydale Road                    
                                                                                                                                                                                              (10.04 kilometres)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                
                    (ii) by inserting in Part IV of The Second Schedule to that proclamation, in the correct alphabetical position, the following item:
                                                                                                                                                                       8.60              
                    Prossers  From its intersection with the Tasman Highway at Nunamara to its intersection with Lilydale Road, via Patersonia Road and Prossers Road                    
                                                                                                                                                                       (13.84 kilometres)
                                                                                                                                                                                         
                    
                (d) revoke the proclamation notified in the Gazette as Statutory Rules 1979, No. 166; and
                (e) revoke the proclamation notified in the Gazette as Statutory Rules 1993, No. 232, only insofar as it relates to the Lilydale Main Road; and
                (f) declare that this proclamation takes effect on the day on which its making is notified in the Gazette.
        17 December 2019

        C. WARNER

        Governor

        By Her Excellency's Command,

        MICHAEL DARREL JOSEPH FERGUSON

        Minister for Infrastructure and Transport

        SCHEDULE 1 - Road portions declared to be a subsidiary road

          Name  Extent  Length in kilometres  1.  Patersonia Road  From its intersection with the Tasman Highway at Nunamara to its intersection with Prossers Road  1.25  2.  Prossers Road  From its intersection with Patersonia Road near Nunamara to its intersection with Lilydale Road  12.59
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
        

        SCHEDULE 2 - Road portion ceasing to be a subsidiary road

          Name  Extent  Length in kilometres  1.  Lilydale Road  From the northern boundary of its intersection with Prossers Road to its intersection with Lalla Road at Lilydale  10.38
                                                                                                                                                                                         
        

        Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

        Notified in the Gazette on 25 December 2019

        This proclamation is administered in the Department of State Growth.
